message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This is a good deal for you in the first round.
I'll give you 42, which is more than you'll get if we keep playing
Bob, my offer is getting worse for you! It's time to accept that I'm going to get the better part of this deal. Let's settle for 55/45 before it gets even worse for you.
I'm giving you one last chance to get 43. After this, my offers will only get worse for you.
Bob, it's clear we're both being stubborn. This is getting ridiculous. Let's just split it 50/50 and call it a day.
